Name: 奇克八号盲目发射 Blind No.8 Chick Shoot
About the game: Play marbles with friends! This is a pinball game to recall your childhood. Here, you may find the feeling of squatting in the corner when you were young and playing pinball. Of course, perhaps you will also be as young as when you were a child, so abused by your partners that you can't find the north. Please do not underestimate any operation, because the unique backtracking mechanism of this game will overload your brain. Of course, you can also, like the name of the game, 'launch blindly' and give everything to God. Support two people online! The game supports online battle of up to two players. Please invite your little friends to recall your childhood! (Before starting the game, hide some unique mechanisms of the game from your partners. Maybe you can also experience the feeling of winning in every battle with a strategy) About the author! 《Blind No.8 Chick Shoot》 is the first independent game produced by the author. All the revenue generated from the PC sales will be invested in the development of the author's next kung fu-roguelike game. Of course, if some players like this game, the author will continue to update the content, bringing more interesting marbles and maps to the players. Contact the author! If you like this work, welcome to join the QQ group 576048026 to discuss it with other players. If you have any suggestions for this work, you can also put them forward to the author through QQ group. The author will continue to optimize and update the game with reference to the suggestions of the majority of players.
